title: Educational Game Design for Science Education: Applying Problem-Based Learning and Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Program developing pre-service teachers' competencies to design and evaluate educational games for science classes. Hybrid learning environment utilizing learner-owned devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design problem-based learning (PBL) scenarios that incorporate science curriculum content.
Learners can optimize gamification elements (scores, feedback, challenges) to align with learning objective achievement.
Learners can develop and apply formative assessment tools to evaluate the learning effectiveness of educational games.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
